CustomField.description: JSON List of Object and fields value to save when making mass payments. ex) [{"objectApi":"Payment__c", "label":"Payment Object", "fieldApiList":["Tender_Type_for_Gifts__c","Tender_Type_for_Pledges__c","Credit_Date__c","Check_Number__c"]}]

CustomField.label: Mass Payment Custom Fields To Save List
